remarks: Subset law for projective subspace sum.  ( ~ unss analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 7-Mar-2012.)
statement:
paddss.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
paddss.s $e |- S = ( PSubSp ` K ) $.
paddss.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
paddss $p |- ( ( K e. B /\ ( X C_ A /\ Y C_ A /\ Z e. S ) ) -> ( ( X C_ Z /\ Y C_ Z ) <-> ( X .+ Y ) C_ Z ) ) $.
